Logger:
Log files/outputs. Type may be 'STANDARD_OUT', 'STANDARD_ERR' or 'FILE'<--> for a file, the absolute file-name (full path) must be specified<-->
Global log filtering level. Possible values are:<--> OFF, SEVERE, WARNING, INFO, TRACE, TRACE_FINE, TRACE_FINEST<--> WARNING
List the fields in the order you want them to appear<--> The available field are:<--> sourceClassName,sourceMethodName,contextName,message,threadName,time,exception<--> sourceClassName,sourceMethodName,contextName,message,time,threadName,exception One character field separator. Additional characters are ignored<--> , Format of the time field in the log file based on Java Date/Time Format<--> HH:mm:ss.SSS yyyy-MM-dd
This is used for SourceClassName filtering.<--> Any sourceClassName starting with the package-String will trigger the filter<--> Note that these may be full/partial package names or full/partial class-names <--> Levels are: OFF, SEVERE, WARNING, INFO, TRACE, TRACE_FINE, TRACE_FINEST<--> Context is any string<-->
